Class CommentRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.williamchung.repositories.AbstractRepository

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repository<Comment,java.lang.Integer>

    public class CommentRepository
extends AbstractRepository
implements Repository<Comment,java.lang.Integer>
    The CommentRepository accesses the Comments table in the database. each method is explained below.

    • Method Detail

      • findByComment

        public java.util.List<Comment> findByComment(java.lang.Integer id)
        We query the database for a list of all the Comments by foreign key Thread id.
        Parameters:
        id - the Thread's id is passed in by the service.
        Returns:
        Return an ArrayList of all the Comments with foreign key matching the given Thread id.

      • save

        public Comment save(Comment comment)
        We save a Comment object in the database
        Specified by:
        save in interface Repository<Comment,java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        comment - a Comment object is passed in by the service. We Insert into the database Values pulled out by Getters.
        Returns:
        Return the saved Comment object, with its id updated with the database genereated id.
